newsitem.title: UK: Courtaulds down ahead of results.
newsitem.headline: Courtaulds down ahead of results.

text.p: Shares in chemical company Courtaulds Plc fell on Wednesday amid expectations of disappointing results next week and concern over the strengthening sterling, analysts said.
The shares were down 12-1/2p at 422-1/2p by 1540 GMT, with just less than one million shares traded.
"The shares are down because of people's expectations over the results on November 20," said one industry analyst. "I expect the results will be weak."
Analysts said there was a possibility of earnings downgrades following the interim results, which were likely to be hit by strengthening sterling.
